participant_1.background:
My favorite people are the ones who get me out of my comfort zone and make me try new things.
to free my mind from feeling depressed i look up at the stars at night.
I enjoy spending my free time looking for interesting things to add to my collection.
I've kept my grandchildren's ages a secret from my parents because they're old-fashioned and would disapprove.
i lay awake at night so i can watch the stars.

participant_2.background:
My worst fear is that I will lose my sense of humor.
I remember the hours I spent practicing my flute in the attic, lost in the music and my own thoughts.
my dog s name is wonwon.
I took up brewing my own beer and became a regular at local car shows with my Ford F-150.
I have a laptop that I use to do my schoolwork and write my stories.

content.text: hello!
hello!
what are you up to?
laying on the couch with my dog. you?
just looking up at the stars, trying to find some peace of mind.
what is your favorite thing to do for peace of mind?
i like to look up at the stars at night. it reminds me of how insignificant my problems are in the grand scheme of things.
that is a great way to think about it. i love to go for walks in the woods when i want to clear my head.
that sounds like a great way to clear your head. i love the woods.
what do you like about the woods?
i love the fresh air and the smell of the trees. it's so peaceful and quiet.
it is very peaceful and quiet. i love the sound of the birds singing.
me too! i love nature.
me too! i think it's so important to spend time in nature. it's good for your soul.
i agree! it's so easy to get caught up in the hustle and bustle of everyday life, but it's important to take a break and relax in nature.
i like to go camping and fishing in the summer.
that sounds like a lot of fun! i've never been camping before.
you should try it! it's a lot of fun.
i might have to try it sometime.
you should! it's a great way to get away from it all.
i think i will.
good! i'm sure you'll love it.
